data.title: Roc Nation retains Redstone Partners to recruit Josh Kaufman as Executive Vice President of Sales & Partnerships - Redstone Partners
data.meta_description: NEW YORK, NY – May 2022   Josh Kaufman joins Roc Nation as EVP of...
data.text:
Roc Nation retains Redstone Partners to recruit Josh Kaufman as Executive Vice President of Sales & Partnerships

NEW YORK, NY – May 2022

Josh Kaufman joins Roc Nation as EVP of Sales & Partnerships where he will be responsible for developing and executing sales strategies and driving new business opportunities through creative partnerships and sponsorships, and cultivating existing partnerships with major brands. In this role, Josh will oversee four key revenue generating teams, which include Brand Partnerships for Roc Nation’s artists, Event Sales/Sponsorships, Roc Nation’s IP to properties and brands, and Licensing. Prior to joining Roc Nation, Josh held sales leadership roles at Digital Trends and SpinMedia Group. Josh received his undergraduate degree from Brooklyn College.

Company Background:

Roc Nation was founded by Shawn “JAY-Z” Carter in 2008 and has grown into the world’s preeminent entertainment company, working in every aspect of modern entertainment—with recording artists and producers, songwriters, and athletes. The company represents a diverse roster of recording artists, musicians, record producers and athletes. With offices in New York City, London, Nashville, Austin and Los Angeles, Roc Nation represents some of the world’s most recognizable names in music, sports, and entertainment. They are a full-service organization, supporting their diverse roster of talent via artist management, music publishing, music/film/TV production, strategic brand development and beyond. Roc Nation has forged strong partnerships with the world’s leading experts in artist / athlete management, technology, fashion, and philanthropy, and are redefining the business of entertainment.

For more information, visit Roc Nation
